Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to requiring ninety days notice be provided to tenants prior to the beginning of work on a major capital improvement
Summary: Requires ninety days notice be provided to tenants prior to the beginning of work on a major capital improvement.
LawCode: Amd §§26-405 & 26-511, NYC Ad Cd; amd §6, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974; amd §4, Emerg Hous Rent Cont L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four and the emergency housing rent control law, in relation to requiring ninety days notice be provided to tenants prior to the beginning of work on a major capital improvement
